data.name: Bubsy: The Woolies Strike Back Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Big, brassy and bold just like our favorite Lynx, Bubsy: The Woolies Strike Back Original Soundtrack is truly the Purrfect edition to your video game music library. Filled with 19 tracks of iconic, beautifully robust and always on key tunes – This is the OST that every Bubsy fan has been waiting for! Bubsy rates it 10 Paws – so will you.

Music by Chris Huelsbeck


Tracklist:
01 - Title Screen
02 - Mountain 1
03 - Mountain 2
04 - Boss Theme 1
05 - Desert Valley
06 - Desert Valley 2
07 - Boss Theme 2
08 - UI Map Dramatic Asteroid Entrance
09 - Asteroid 1
10 - Asteroid 2
11 - UI Map Menu Music
12 - Asteroid 3
13 - Boss Theme 3
14 - Credits Screen
15 - Menues
16 - Game Over Screen
17 - Score Screen
18 - Mix Intro
19 - Outro

Songs will be placed in your OST folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Bubsy The Woolies Strike Back\ost

data.short_description: 19 Tracks of iconic, beautifully robust and always on key tunes. Bubsy rates it 10 Paws – so will you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo@2.8GHz / AMD Athlon II X2@2.8GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6800, ATI X1800 XT or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card and the latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Peripherals Supported: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse, optional controller (Xbox 360® Controller for Windows recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5@2.66GHz / AMD Phenom II X4@3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R 200 series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card and the latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Peripherals Supported: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse, optional controller (Xbox 360® Controller for Windows recommended)
